slam.name: slam
slam.description: Slams the target with a mighty force
combatHitStrings: ${nameSelf} slams ${nameEnemy} to the ground with a mighty force dealing ${damageDealt} damage!
combatCriticalStrings: ${nameSelf} weapon slams ${nameEnemy} with a critical hit, crushing every bone in its body dealing ${damageDealt} damage!
combatMissStrings: ${nameSelf}'s mighty swing misses ${nameEnemy} and shatters the ground!

heartStrike.name: heart strike
heartStrike.description: Attempts to slice through the target's heart to deal a critical strike
combatCriticalStrings: ${nameSelf} cuts through ${nameEnemy} piercing its heart with a critical hit dealing ${damageDealt} damage!
combatMissStrings: In a valient attempt to stab ${nameEnemy}, ${nameSelf} misses awkwardly its target!

shieldWall.name: shield wall
shieldWall.description: Raises the shield to increase the defensive capabilities for the rest of the fight
combatHitStrings: ${nameSelf} raises the shield to significantly increase its defence!

whirlwind.name: whirlwind
whirlwind.description: Spins around hitting multiple targets at the same time
